body_html:
@nubbel I see you have the SavedModel working, did you get the export working with Sparse based tensors ? specifically from the Deep and Wide examples, namely sparse_column_with_keys or sparse_column_with_hash_bucket, I can get an export working if I use real_valued_column and bucketized_column (using real_valued_columns), has to do with the resulting 'SparseTensor' object has no attribute 'name'

Peter

body:
